sentences.sContent: ...a perfect balance of yin and yang.
Moving from spring to winter, active yang is inevitably followed by dormant yin.
sentences.sCn: 春去冬来，阳盛不可避免地被伏阴所取代。

trans.tranOther: In Chinese philosophy, yang is one of the two opposing principles whose interaction is believed to influence everything in the universe. Yang is positive, bright, and masculine while  is negative, dark, and feminine.
